snippet: The story of Christian Hesch, who said he injected EPO 54 times, illuminates an end of the doping spectrum away from the money and glamour of Tour de France champions.
abstract: Story of competitive runner Christian Hesch, who says he injected banned blood booster EPO 54 times, illuminates other end of doping spectrum away from money and glamour of elite athletes like Lance Armstrong.
lead_paragraph: The story of Christian Hesch, who said he injected EPO 54 times, illuminates an end of the doping spectrum away from the money and glamour of Tour de France champions.

headline.seo: The Runner Christian Hesch Describes Doping With EPO
headline.main: In Chase for Wins, a Runner Cheats
headline.print_headline: In Chase for Wins, a Runner Cheats
